pageTitle: Try it: Nikon FX SLR (DF, D1-D4, D600-D800) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Jorgen, my name is Jorgen After you've tried one of the top Nikon or Canon models, current or an old one like the D2H, all other cameras seem to response slowly. For sports, events, press conferences etc., that speed can mean the difference between getting the photo or not getting it. Most news photos are printed well within the limitations of 4 MP, so the file size isn't as much of a problem as one would believe. -- hide signature --
